text: Carl Peterson (born 1943) is a National Football League team president. Carl Peterson may also refer to: * Carl Peterson (Australian footballer) (born 1987), Australian rules footballer * Carl Peterson (One Life to Live), character on the soap opera One Life to Live * Carl Jerrold Peterson (1936–1969), U.S. Navy officer * Carl Peterson (American football) (1897–1964), American football player == See also == * Carl Petersen (disambiguation) * Carl Pettersson (disambiguation)
title: Carl Peterson (disambiguation)
